Message:
I’m glad I was able to
borrow a book on magic
from Miss Merlyn...!

She even gave me
all the ingredients I’ll need...

Now, let’s see...
So, all I have to do is
melt down these ingredients,
and put some magic in
as a finishing touch, huh?

If I do that, my witch power
can make a candy
that keeps sparkling forever...!

I can make a candy
as pretty as a gemstone...
A sparkling candy
that’ll make Cerberus happy...!

Alright! Now, then...
Let’s try again,
from a fresh batch
of candy syrup...!
